title: Live Classes
text: Students participate in interactive live classes where they can ask questions and engage with teachers in real-time. This immediate interaction helps clarify doubts.

title: Recorded Sessions
text: If a student misses a class, they can access recorded sessions later. This flexibility allows them to learn at their own pace and revisit complex topics.

title: Study Material
text: PW provides comprehensive study materials, including video lectures, notes, and practice questions. These resources cover the entire JEE syllabus in a structured manner.

title: Doubt Resolution
text: A dedicated doubt-clearing portal is available. Students can submit questions during or after classes, and responses are provided within 24 hours, ensuring they get help when needed.

title: Mock Tests
text: Regular mock tests simulate the exam experience and help students assess their understanding and improve their exam readiness.

title: Performance Tracking
text: A performance dashboard allows students to track their progress, attendance, and grades. This feature helps identify strengths and areas needing improvement.

title: Peer Interaction
text: Students can participate in peer-to-peer doubt-solving sessions, enhancing collaborative learning and building a supportive community.

title: Personalized Learning Plans
text: PW creates customized study plans based on individual student needs and strengths, ensuring focused preparation.

title: Regular Feedback
text: Teachers provide regular feedback on performance, helping students stay motivated and on track with their studies.

title: Mobile App Access
text: Students can access classes and materials through a mobile app, allowing for learning on the go.

title: Learn from Home
text: With PW, students can learn from home. This saves time and makes it easier to balance studies with other activities.

title: Dedicated Faculties
text: PW has dedicated faculties for each subject who helps the aspirants to understand the subjects.

title: Well-Organized Study Material
text: The coaching provides well-organized study materials. These materials cover all important topics needed for the JEE exams.

title: Live Doubt-Solving Classes
text: Students attend live classes where they can ask questions in real-time. This interaction helps clear doubts and improves understanding.

title: Regular Mock Tests
text: PW offers regular mock tests. These tests help students practice and prepare for the actual exam. They also help identify areas that need improvement.
